comment.text: This translation key is used for the "Create room" button label in various UI components, such as buttons and dialog headers. It appears when a user clicks on the "Create room" link or button to initiate the creation of a new room.

usage.context:
</ModalDialog.Body>

 label={t("Common:CreateRoom")}
 size="normal"
 primary
 onClick={onAction}
 scale
 />

<Button
 scale
 primary
 tabIndex={0}
 size={ButtonSize.normal}
 label={t("Common:CreateRoom")}
 onClick={onSubmit}
 />
 <Button
 scale
 tabIndex={0}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Otaq yaradın" directly translates to "You created a room." The English phrase "Create room" is an imperative and more accurately translates to "Yaradın otaq" or "Otaq yaradın!" (Create a room!). The current translation implies that the user *has* already created a room.

While "Креирај собу" is understandable, a more natural and commonly used translation of "Create room" in Serbian (Cyrillic) would be "Направи собу" or "Отвори собу". "Креирај" is more formal and less frequently used in this context.
